EmailTemplate.subject: Give a gift that's different this Christmas!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Live Different shirts make a great Christmas gift because they look awesome, and because the proceeds of each sale goes directly to our charitable programs. They're really a gift that keeps on giving, helping us to make a difference in communities across Canada and around the world.
This Holiday Season, we're excited to release our new, LIMITED EDITION zip up hoodies. They're super stylish, AND super cozy for the winter! 100% of the proceeds of these hoodies will go towards Live Different's student empowerment programs, bringing a message of hope to young people across Canada through our high school presentations.
Visit http://store.livedifferent.com to buy now.
Gift a donation to Live Different and print off our Christmas Card to give to friends & family!
Copy and past link below to download card http://livedifferent.com/card_2014.pdf?utm_source=newsletter&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=limitedhoodie
This year, instead of filling your gift list with fuzzy slippers and Christmas ties, why not dedicate a donation as a gift to your friends and family?
Every donation to Live Different helps create pivotal life change in those we encounter across Canada and in our international communities.
Donate Now - http://livedifferent.com/donate
